response.original_title: Unveiling the Mysteries of the Bible
response.overview: History - Christian writer Grant Jeffrey hosts this investigation of the Scriptures, exploring some of the mysteries that have puzzled readers for centuries. Focusing on several of the Bible's best-known stories, Jeffrey takes viewers on a journey to uncover the meaning of faith. Topics include Christ's resurrection; the virgin birth and the star of Bethlehem; the fall of the walls of Jericho; the 10 plagues of Exodus; Joshua's long day; and much more. -
response.title: Unveiling the Mysteries of the Bible
